item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 04 Oct 2022
item.description:
1. How to dump many floats in binary format so that OCaml can read them in later
  2. Beta of neovim treesitter-reason
  3. data-encoding 0.7
  4. New OCaml meetup group in Toulouse (in French)
  5. opam-mirror: a MirageOS unikernel that provides an opam repository and cache
  6. Aches.1.0.0, Ringo.1.0.0
  7. Multicore with opam--instructions?
  8. Other OCaml News
